          <title>
            <string language="en">Recycling codes for plastics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wiederverwertung der Codes für Plastik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réutilisation des codes pour des plastiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recycling códigos para plásticos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riciclaggio dei codici per la plastica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κώδικες ανακύκλωσης για τα πλαστικά</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reciclaje de los códigos para los plásticos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show some recycling codes printed on recyclable plastic materials.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">recycling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">codes</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">plastics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wastes</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>

            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen einige aufbereitencodes, 
die auf zurückführbarem Plastik gedruckt werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations montrent quelques codes de 
réutilisation imprimés sur les matières plastiques recyclables.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram alguns códigos 
recycling impressos em materiais plásticos recyclable.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano alcuni codici di 
riciclaggio stampati sulle materie plastiche riciclabili.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν μερικούς κώδικες 
ανακύκλωσης που τυπώνονται στα ανακυκλώσιμα πλαστικά υλικά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran algunos códigos de 
reciclaje impresos en los materiales plásticos reciclables.</string>
          </description>
